alert.note: Alert for Little Colorado River Valley in Apache County; White Mountains (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 16 at 11:25AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Apache County through NOON MST... At 1124 AM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Vernon, or 18 miles west of Springerville, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 MPH and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Vernon. This includes Highway 60 between mile markers 362 and 377. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Little Colorado River Valley in Apache County; White Mountains
